thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: General Mills Recalls Some Gluten-Free Cheerios That May Contain Wheat
thread.title_full: General Mills Recalls Some Gluten-Free Cheerios That May Contain Wheat - WSJ

author: Tess Stynes
title: General Mills Recalls Some Gluten-Free Cheerios That May Contain Wheat
text:
General Mills Inc. said it is voluntarily recalling some Cheerios and Honey Nut Cheerios produced over several days in July at its Lodi, Calif., plant because the products, which are labeled gluten-free, may contain wheat.
Minneapolis-based General Mills said the cereal is being recalled because of an isolated incident in which wheat flour—which contains gluten—was inadvertently introduced into the gluten-free oat flour system at the Lodi plant. Products containing wheat can lead to illness or severe health effects for...
